5 RELATED WORK
Existing data valuation methods include LOO and influence function (Koh & Liang, 2017), the Shapley value (Jia et al., 2019b; Ghorbani & Zou, 2019; Wang & Jia, 2023), the Banzhaf value (Wang & Jia, 2022), Least Cores (Yan & Procaccia, 2021), Beta Shapley (Kwon & Zou, 2021), and reinforcement learning-based method (Yoon et al., 2020).
